page.title: 07PARISH COUNCIL
page.content: PARISH AFFAIRS ARE ADMINISTERED BY THE PARISH COUNCIL OF SEVEN MEMBERS, ELECTED EVERY FOUR YEARS.AN ANNUAL PRECEPT IS LEVIED ON THE RATES, PRODUCING AN INCOME OF Â£300 APPROX. THIS IS USED TO PAY FOR THE UPKEEP OF COUNCIL PROPERTY,GRANTS OF Â£75 TO THE PLAYING FIELD AND VILLAGE HALL AND Â£100 TO MAINTAIN THE CHURCHYARD. PROBLEMS CONCERNING ROADS ARE SENT TO THE COUNTY COUNCIL,THOSE CONCERNING PLANNING,HOUSING OR OTHER AMENITIES TO THE DISTRICT COUNCIL.ALL SECRETARIAL WORK IS DEALT WITH BY THE PARIS CLERK WHO RECEIVES A STIPEND OF Â£65 FROM PARISH FUNDS. THE COUNCIL ALSO ADMINISTER 4 ACRES OF ALLOTMENTS,LEASED FROM OXFORD UNIVERSITY AND LET IN PLOTS OF 1/4 ACRE.THESE ARE IN HIGHER ROAD.RENTS ARE Â£10 PER ANNUM,PAYABLE HALF YEARLY AT MICHAELMAS AND LADY DAY.
